text: E'ina hu'negu huge'za Lebanonitira sida zafa antagi'za eme namiho. Eri'za vahe'nimozane, kagri eri'za vahe'mo'zane ana eri'zana eneri'nage'na nama'a zago agima ahesanana, kagri eri'za vahera zagoa tesizamantegahue. Hagi kagra ko antahinka kenka hu'nane, mago'a tagri vahe'mo'za Saidoni vahe'motama zafama nentagi'za zana hu'za zafa ontagigahaze.
